overview: James Wallace founded Cranel, Inc., parent company of ISOdx, in 1985 and today guides the company’s overall strategic direction. Prior to founding Cranel, Jim was not only the owner of Microtech, an electronic component manufacturer’s representatives firm, but also established Cascade Data, an electronic component company, and REP Associates, a business computer firm. Through Jim’s leadership and his more than 30 years experience in information technology and engineering, Cranel has grown into an expansive company with locations across the U.S. A graduate of North Dakota State University, Jim also received a MBA from the University of Iowa and attended the Advanced Management Program at Harvard University.
